required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Collection of Clinical Specimens From Volunteers for Assay Development
clinical_study.official_title: Collection of Clinical Specimens From Volunteers for Assay Development

brief_summary.textblock: This study will analyze gene expression data from various biological specimens collected from voluntary participants.

detailed_description.textblock: Primary objective is the collection of specimens from volunteers for the development and validation of HostDx tests. The study does only encompass specimen collection - Therefore, no traditional endpoint is defined but rather the successful collection of clinical specimens is defined as the endpoint.

primary_outcome.measure: Collection of Specimens from Volunteers for the Development and Validation of HostDx Tests
primary_outcome.description: Blood collection, upper respiratory specimens including. nasal swabs, nasal washes, nasopharyngeal swabs, buccal swabs, buccal washes), sputum, saliva, urine and a skin/soft-tissue specimen (dermal).

intervention.description: HostDx Fever test to distinguish between viral and bacterial infections
HostDx Fever test to determine the severity of a presented, suspected infection.

biospec_descr.textblock: Blood sample collected in PAXgene tubes and Nasal Swabs

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- 18 years of age or greater
- Able to provide informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Known pregnancy
- Inability to understand instructions and comply with study related procedures
